price: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi ijambo rya Nyagasani wawe (ry’ibihano) ryabereye impamo ntibazigera bemera.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūna
